question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. yellow taxi
B. yellow store sign on the left
C. None
D. None

options.B: yellow store sign on the left

triage_reason: The yellow store sign on the left is clearly set further back on the building facade, behind the yellow taxi which is closer to the foreground, making the depth relationship obvious without a depth map.
